title: Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas - Cheats

cheats.name: Armor, health and $250,000 in money (also repairs vehicles occupied by the player and increases the criminal rating to 40)
cheats.longDescription: Enabling the "Health and Armor" cheat during the bike chase of Just Business and during the drive-by portion of End of the Line will fail the mission, destroying the bike/Feltzer, leading to CJ's eventual death. Furthermore, enabling the cheat during Lure will automatically remove the doors of the Rancher, leading to a more difficult mission completion.

cheats.name: Commit suicide / Instant death
cheats.description: Instantly kills CJ (unless unlimited health active)
cheats.longDescription: CJ will not die if the unlimited health cheat is activated.

cheats.name: Hitman level for all weapons
cheats.description: Unlocks maximum weapon proficiency for all guns

cheats.name: Lock wanted level
cheats.longDescription: Facilitates exploration of islands/cities and restricted areas before they're unlocked

cheats.name: Raise wanted level by two stars
cheats.longDescription: If the Lock wanted level cheat is on it will not attain. Entering this cheat during "555 We Tip" will fail the mission.

cheats.name: Six-star wanted level
cheats.longDescription: If the Lock wanted level cheat is on it will not attain. Entering this cheat during "555 We Tip" will fail the mission.

cheats.name: Maximum sex appeal
cheats.description: Instantly maximizes CJ's sex appeal stat

cheats.name: Maximum vehicle skills
cheats.description: Maximizes all driving and piloting abilities

cheats.name: Minimum fat
cheats.description: Minimizes CJ's fat and muscle stats

cheats.name: Parachute
cheats.description: Spawns a parachute for safe landings

cheats.name: Super punches (one hit kills)
cheats.longDescription: Pedestrians can also make a super punch attack. If a pedestrian punches CJ, he will be instantly killed. However, if the Unlimited Health cheat is activated, super punches do not affect CJ.

cheats.name: Unlimited ammunition with no reload for all weapons
cheats.longDescription: Using this cheat may glitch the game's sounds. This cheat also affects pedestrians.

cheats.name: Unlimited health
cheats.longDescription: Explosions, drowning, falling, and gunshots from police-controlled helicopters still hurt the player. CJ will also die from being in a vehicle that explodes.

cheats.name: Weapons, tier 1 (Brass Knuckles, Baseball Bat, Pistol, Shotgun, Micro SMG, AK47, Rifle, Rocket Launcher, Molotov Cocktails & Spray Paint)
cheats.longDescription: Entering this cheat numerous times will give the player infinite ammo.

cheats.name: Weapons, tier 2 (Fist, Knife, Desert Eagle, Sawn-Off Shotgun, TEC 9, M4, Sniper Rifle, Flamethrower, Fire Extinguisher & Grenades)
cheats.description: Provides tier 2 weapon set including Desert Eagle, M4, and Sniper Rifle
cheats.longDescription: Entering this cheat during Tagging Up Turf will fail the mission.

cheats.name: Weapons, tier 3 (Fist, Chainsaw, Silenced 9mm, SPAS 12, SMG, M4, Heat-Seeking Rocket Launcher, Satchel Charges & Detonator)
cheats.longDescription: If the player uses the infinite ammo cheat, the detonator will still appear in the weapon list even when the player doesn't have any satchel charges.

cheats.name: Weapons Tier 4
cheats.description: Weapons, tier 4 (Minigun, Vibrator, Random: Night Vision Goggles or Thermal Vision Goggles)

cheats.name: Complete invulnerability
cheats.longDescription: No damage from guns, fire, falls, explosions, drowning, gunshots from police helicopters etc.; any vehicle the player enters is permanently invulnerable too.

cheats.name: All cars have nitrous
cheats.description: Adds nitrous boost to all vehicles
cheats.longDescription: When modifying a car, it appears as "2x Nitro".

cheats.name: Flying cars
cheats.description: Enables all cars to fly when accelerating
cheats.longDescription: Cars are controlled like planes, except they have no left and right rudder.

cheats.name: Full weapon aiming in vehicles + Micro SMG
cheats.description: Full weapon aiming in vehicles + Micro SMG (If CJ doesn't have this type of weapon)
cheats.longDescription: Micro SMG (If CJ doesn't have this type of weapon)

cheats.name: Massive bicycle bunny hops
cheats.description: Massive bicycle bunny hops (Jump 100 feet in air)

cheats.name: Carl's car is invincible and can instantly destroy other vehicles (Auto-immune car)
cheats.description: Makes current vehicle invincible and able to destroy other vehicles on contact
cheats.longDescription: Invincibility is unreliable and occasionally turns itself off after cutscenes, inside the car when just finishing dates and missions or if Carl's inside the car when the cheat is turned on. The player has to exit and re-enter the car to re-enable the invincibility, or else Carl's car will blow up when blowing up another car. Also if the player disables this cheat while inside the vehicle, it will become all-proof and also not destroyed when using cheats "Blow up all vehicles". If the vehicle is stored into the garage, it will immediately lose its' fire and damage-proof qualities, but retain the bullet-proofing and explosion-proofing.

cheats.name: Beach party theme
cheats.description: Spawns beach party with bikini-clad pedestrians
cheats.longDescription: Enabling the "Beach party theme" cheat during the Valet will fail the mission CJ's outfit is changed to Victim olive shorts, flip-flops, and Pro-Laps sunglasses. Traffic and pedestrians are replaced with those usually seen around Verona Beach. Weather set to very sunny.

cheats.name: Carnival/funhouse theme (CJ's outfit changes to a pink Cesar haircut, joker glasses and red heart boxers. Pedestrians are replaced with fast food workers and clowns. Traffic consists of Pizza Boys, BF Injections, Hotknifes, Tugs, Quads, Karts, Mr. Whoopees, and Hotdogs. All four-wheeled vehicles, except emergency vehicles, are equipped with hydraulics.)
cheats.longDescription: Enabling the "Carnival/funhouse theme" cheat during the Valet will fail the mission CJ's outfit changes to a pink Cesar haircut, joker glasses and red heart boxers Pedestrians are replaced with fast food workers and clowns. Traffic consists of Pizza Boys, BF Injections, Hotknifes, Tugs, Quads, Karts, Mr. Whoopees, and Hotdogs. All four-wheeled vehicles, except emergency vehicles, are equipped with hydraulics.

cheats.name: Cars float away when hit
cheats.description: Makes vehicles float upward when struck or damaged
cheats.longDescription: This cheat does not work in missions involving races and car chases.

cheats.name: Pedestrians riot
cheats.description: Unlike previous games, this code can be turned on and...
cheats.longDescription: Unlike previous games, this code can be turned on and off at will. However, keeping it on may cause problems during the storyline. This code brings up data from the Los Santos Riots except on a statewide scale.

cheats.name: Explode all vehicles (except bicycles)
cheats.longDescription: Vehicles that have been already destroyed will also explode. Any deaths caused by this cheat will be counted in the player's kill count.

cheats.name: Invisible cars
cheats.description: Makes all vehicles invisible (only wheels visible)

cheats.name: Kinky theme/pimp mode
cheats.description: CJ's outfit changes to the gimp suit. Pedestrians consist of pimps and prostitutes equipped with dildos. Prostitutes are attracted to CJ and follow him around.
cheats.longDescription: Enabling the "Kinky theme/pimp mode" cheat during the Valet will fail the mission CJ's outfit changes to the gimp suit. Pedestrians consist of pimps and prostitutes equipped with dildos. Prostitutes are attracted to CJ and follow him around.

cheats.name: Prostitutes pay Carl instead of taking Carl's money
cheats.description: Prostitutes pay Carl instead of taking Carl's money (For some unknown reason, this cheat will alternate between giving the player Thermal Vision Goggles and Night Vision Goggles every time this cheat is activated. It also gives him a Minigun with some ammo. Tested and confirmed on PS3.)
cheats.longDescription: For some unknown reason, this cheat will alternate between giving the player Thermal Vision Goggles and Night Vision Goggles every time this cheat is activated. It also gives him a Minigun with some ammo. Tested and confirmed on PS3.

cheats.name: No pedestrians/reduced traffic
cheats.longDescription: Parked cars still spawn.

cheats.name: Pedestrians have weapons
cheats.description: Arms all pedestrians with various weapons

cheats.name: Pedestrians riot (with golf club)
cheats.longDescription: This code changes the all ped acquaintances of the male and female ped types to hate, except for the street criminals, prostitutes, and mission ped types. Madd Dogg will instantly jump off the roof once Carl starts his mission.

cheats.name: Rural theme (CJ's outfit changes to a Binco Trucker Cap and overalls. Traffic and pedestrians are replaced with those usually seen in Red and Flint counties.)
cheats.longDescription: Enabling the "Rural theme" cheat during the Valet will fail the mission CJ's outfit changes to a Binco Trucker Cap and overalls. Traffic and pedestrians are replaced with those usually seen in Red and Flint counties.

cheats.name: Sports car traffic (Traffic consists of Buffalos, Cheetahs, Uranuses, Euroses, Bullets, Infernuses, ZR-350s, Stratums, Elegies, Flashes, Jesters, Sultans, Clubs, Phoenixes, Hotknives, Super GTs, Banshees, Comets
cheats.description: Sports car traffic (Traffic consists of Buffalos, Cheetahs, Uranuses, Euroses, Bullets, Infernuses, ZR-350s, Stratums, Elegies, Flashes, Jesters, Sultans, Clubs, Phoenixes, Hotknives, Super GTs, Banshees, Comets and Turismos.)Note: Random vehicle spawn points also spawn sports cars. The cheat does not tend to spawn Alphas, however.
cheats.longDescription: Traffic consists of Buffalos, Cheetahs, Uranuses, Euroses, Bullets, Infernuses, ZR-350s, Stratums, Elegies, Flashes, Jesters, Sultans, Clubs, Phoenixes, Hotknives, Super GTs, Banshees, Comets and Turismos.

cheats.name: Triad theme
cheats.description: Triad theme (CJ is equipped with a katana and all pedestrians are replaced with groups of Triads. Traffic mostly consists of PCJ 600s, FCR-900s, and BF-400s. All vehicles spawn in all black, behaving identically to the black traffic cheat.)
cheats.longDescription: CJ is equipped with a katana and all pedestrians are replaced with groups of Triads. Traffic mostly consists of PCJ 600s, FCR-900s, and BF-400s. All vehicles spawn in all black, behaving identically to the black traffic cheat.

cheats.name: Gang members spawn much faster
cheats.description: Spawns a Gang Members Much Faster vehicle

cheats.name: Gang wars break out all over San Andreas (can be deactivated)
cheats.longDescription: Gangs will turn hostile and attack CJ and his gang.

cheats.name: No citizens or cops, only gang members having gunfights (can be deactivated)
cheats.longDescription: Gangs will turn hostile and attack CJ and his gang.

cheats.name: Recruit anyone into gang with Pistols
cheats.description: Allows recruiting any pedestrian as gang member
cheats.longDescription: If the player recruits a Ballas and/or Vagos gang member and starts a gang war, the recruited Ballas and/or Vagos will immediately attack the player.

cheats.name: Recruit anyone into gang with rocket launchers
cheats.description: Allows recruiting any pedestrian as gang member
cheats.longDescription: If the player recruits a Ballas and/or Vagos gang member and starts a gang war, the recruited Ballas and/or Vagos will immediately attack the player.

cheats.name: Recruit anyone into gang with AK47s
cheats.description: Allows recruiting any pedestrian as gang member
cheats.longDescription: If the player recruits a Ballas and/or Vagos gang member and starts a gang war, the recruited Ballas and/or Vagos will immediately attack the player.

cheats.name: Always midnight (00:00)
cheats.longDescription: Odd sudden weather changes. If Carl is wasted, the time reverts to 12:00. When disabled the time that passed is added to the current time. Only locks the timecycle (sky colour). Sun still rises/sets and map brightens/darkens as usual even with this cheat activated.

cheats.name: Always 21:00 with orange sky
cheats.longDescription: When disabled the time that passed is added to the current time.

cheats.name: Speed up time
cheats.description: Enter the same code again to deactivate.
cheats.longDescription: Enter the same code again to deactivate.
